adHeader: Carpentry and home repairs Sonoma and Marin County
adDetails: Carpenters with many years of experience, dry rot, sheet rock, hinged door repair and installations, Weather stripping and weatherization preperation/ repairs, pocket door repair, sliding glass door repair/installations, painting, remodels, window replacement and repairs, flooring hardwood, linoleum, laminate flooring, finish carpentry: trim, baseboards, door & window casings, crown moulding, plumbing, kitchens and bathrooms, home additions and remodels, roofing, gutters, fences, decks, electrical, remodels, retaining walls, masonry and concrete.
